NetworkInterface.description: The NetworkInterface schema describes links to the network adapters, network ports, and network device functions, and represents the functionality available to the containing system.
NetworkInterface.longDescription: This resource contains links to the network adapters, network porta, and network device functions, and represents the functionality available to the containing system.

title: #NetworkInterface.NetworkInterface
